name: NEHA UPADHYAY
company_address: 135 VRAJ HOMES, NR NANDANBAUG BUNGALOWS, SHELA, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, 380058
my_business: PulpPiyo is a fruit-based, non-carbonated ready-to-drink beverage crafted for everyone - from kids to adults - who crave natural refreshment with a nutritious twist. Available in two delicious flavours - Mango, and Guava - each bottle is made from real fruit pulp, delivering authentic taste without artificial sweeteners.
top_product: Both our Mango and Guava are strong performers in their own right, catering to different consumer preferences. Mango is our all-rounder — a familiar, citrus-forward flavor that appeals to a wide range of age groups. It’s refreshing, vitamin-rich, and perfect for everyday hydration. Guava is our unique differentiator — chatpata, sweet, smooth, and indulgent. It resonates especially well with younger audiences and those seeking something beyond the usual fruit drink flavors. Together, these two flavors form the backbone of our brand — one grounded in familiarity, the other driven by taste discovery.
ideal_referral: I'm looking to connect with individuals or businesses who can help bring PulpPiyo, our fruit-based beverage brand into high visibility spaces. Ideal referrals include: - Distributors with experience in beverages or FMCG, who service retail stores, schools, colleges, offices, or quick-serve restaurants - Snack counter or canteen operators in corporate parks, hospitals, educational institutions, or transport hubs - Café or restaurant chains open to introducing new bottled drinks to their menu or chillers - Event organizers or caterers who need ready-to-serve, flavorful drinks for large audiences - Retail buyers or decision-makers at convenience stores, local grocery chains, or lifestyle supermarkets
top_problem_solved: Problem: Most fruit drinks are either too artificial or too functional, lacking real flavor or balance. Our solution: Tasty, fruit-based beverages made with real content, added vitamins, and shelf-stable convenience - built for real people, every day.

my_business: We at R&R Bakes are committed to provide high-end handcrafted bakery products to our customers. We are FSSAI registered home bakery currently operating from Ahmedabad but ship across India. We specialize in customized, exotic and premium quality desserts, making it safe for all age groups. We cater to customers from different backgrounds by understanding the customer’s need, their theme, occasion and most importantly their budget for which they are looking for the dessert. We bake all types of artisan cakes, cookies, chocolates, diet-friendly and PCOS friendly cakes and vegan and gluten free desserts. We are certified with Diploma in Eggless baking from Academy of Pastry Arts Malaysia and have been awarded as among the Top 100 Home Bakers in India. Our USP is that our products are completely Egg- free, Preservative free and hygienically made from scratch.
top_product: Handcrafted Cakes, Cookies and Chocolates

name: Ramesh Songar
